Package sophiabcrypt

Class SbcPswControl

java.lang.Object
sophiabcrypt.SbcPswControl
public class SbcPswControl
extends Object
This class can be validate password policy (if both are same, minimal length, formation) By the way, SophiaBCrypt just allow password with: 1 - That has at least 1 lowercase or uppercase letter 2 - That has at least 1 number 3 - That has at least 1 Special Char 4 - That has at least 8 Chars of length
Since:
Sep/2018
Author:
CesarBianchi

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init​(String cP1, String cP2, String cOp)
      Is the same a "Constructor" method, receives a two passwords inputed by user
      Parameters:
      cP1 - The first password inputed
      cP2 - The second password inputed
      cOp - The Operation (ENC or DEC)
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • getPsw1

      private String getPsw1()
      This method returns the First password inputed by user
      Returns:
      cPsw1 The First password inputed, without validations
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • getPsw2

      private String getPsw2()
      This method returns the Second password inputed by user
      Returns:
      cPsw2 The Second password inputed, without validations
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • IsValidPsw

      public boolean IsValidPsw()
      This method provide all validations about passwords inputed, by according with SophiaBCrypt password policy. Details about password policy, read description of this class
      Returns:
      lReturn True for valid password or False to invalid password
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • PswsAreEquals

      private boolean PswsAreEquals()
      This method validate if all passwords (1 and 2) are equals
      Returns:
      lReturn True for equals passwords or False to diferent passwords
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • PswMinLength

      private boolean PswMinLength()
      This method validate the minimal length of password
      Returns:
      lReturn True for Ok length password or False to not ok length passwords
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • PswContainNumber

      private boolean PswContainNumber()
      This method validate if password contains numbers
      Returns:
      lReturn True for Ok password or False to not ok passwords
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • PswContainChars

      private boolean PswContainChars()
      This method validate if password contains chars
      Returns:
      lReturn True for Ok password or False to not ok passwords
      Since:
      Sep/2018
